items.todoItem: Don’t forget or ignore the Lord’s teaching and His commandments.
Take God’s commandments to heart making it a priority to obey them.
Know that obedience to God’s commandments will bring length of days, long life and peace to you.
Don’t let go of mercy and truth.
Demonstrate mercy and truth in the way that you live.
Make mercy and truth a priority in your life and you will find favour and good understanding in the sight of God and man.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart.
Don’t rely on your own understanding.
Seek God’s instruction in everything you do and He will make your paths pleasant and prosperous.
Don’t be wise in your own eyes.
Fear the Lord.
Depart from evil.
Know that when you fear the Lord and depart from evil it will bring blessing to your health and well being.
Honour the Lord with your wealth and with the first fruits of all your increase.
Know that the Lord will bless you with plenty when you honour Him with your offerings and tithes.
Don’t despise the chastening of the Lord.
Don’t grow weary of the Lord’s correction.
Know that those who the Lord loves He corrects.
Expect the Lord’s correction because He loves you just like a father who corrects the son in whom he delights.
Know that obtaining wisdom and understanding will bring you happiness.
Know that wisdom and understanding are more profitable than silver and more valuable than gold.
Recognise the importance and true value of wisdom and understanding which are beyond comparison with anything you could possibly desire.
Know that wisdom brings long life, wealth and honour.
Know that the ways of wisdom are pleasant and peaceful.
Know that wisdom is a tree of life, happiness and prosperity to all who obtain and retain her.
Know that God used His wisdom and understanding to construct the Earth and the heavens.
Know that God knows how to part the sea and how to cause it to rain.
Do not let wisdom and understanding out of your sight.
Demonstrate obedience to sound wisdom and discretion.
Don’t be frightened by sudden feelings of alarm.
Know that the Lord shall be your confidence and will protect you.
Don’t withhold good from them to whom it is due when you are able to.
Don’t argue with someone for no reason.
Know that the Lord curses the wicked.
Know that the Lord blesses the habitation of the just.
Know that the Lord gives grace to the lowly.
Know that the wise shall inherit glory.
Know that shame shall be the reward of fools.
